title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Find partners in Europe
description: This text provides advice on finding partners in Europe for investigative journalism, including contact information for Scandinavian IRE-like organizations and other European organizations that are part of the Global Investigative Journalism Network. It also discusses a cross-border data case in the EU related to agricultural subsidies and new access rules in the EU.
